Tucson looks to Rodimus, as he takes Lord Elder's question into heart.

" L=
ord Elder brings up a good point.  We need to find out what's going on with=
 the Predacons and find out what those Humans were up to.  I'm wondering if=
 these events are connected to each other.  Windlord, Perceptor, I entrust =
you with the task of gathering the intel we need about the Predacons and th=
e Humans. Rodimus and I will begin our survey of the parameters and see wha=
t we come up with.  And by the way, Talon will be flying with me, of course=
."

His arm does not let go of Talon, as he embraces her gently.

Straights=
hot nods and looks up to Leo Prime.

" If ya want, I can continue trying ta=
 contact the others.  I'm sure someone's out there, there has ta be."

Nigh=
tshift stops to try and scratch at the strange metallic rash on his leg. Qu=
ickstride nudges his head away from the metallic wound like object.

"No, s=
top that!  Bump and Stanton are right.  That could be very dangerous to you=
r body."

Local artist who specializes in illustration, using traditional a=
nd digital media.  

I also specialize in hand made crafts.  Great for any =
occasion!  

Need a great gift idea that is original?  No problem!  Email m=
e at this address and we will talk.  

On May 2, 2012, at 12:07 PM, Super C=
yclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> LEGACY nodded to TUCSON, "The n=
eed to monitor that rip is of paramount
> importance." He said solemly, his=
 single optic flickering
> thoughtfully.
> 
> At the same time RODIMUS was =
also nodding to TUCSON, "Yeah, let's look
> around and see what we can find=
." Anyone loking at RODIMUS can see
> that he is built something like the O=
PTIMAL OPTIMUS was, so he could
> indeed turn into a phoenix, but it was al=
so obvious he had other modes
> as well.
> 
> LORD ELDER shook his head, "E=
xuse me sirs." he said as he crossed his
> arms over his chest. "Shouldn't =
we also send out someone to try and
> figure out what those Predacons were =
doing?" Of course he was talking
> about BLIGHT and POWERPINCH who PERCEPTO=
R and WINDLORD had seen the
> humans giving energy/glowing rocks to through=
 some sort of strange
> statue.
> 
> As all of this was going on BUMP and S=
ANTON were walking beside
> NIGHTSHIFT, "We need to get you taken care of b=
efore you start trying
> to do too much of anything, this could be life thr=
eatening." They were
> looking at the leg.
> 
> LEO PRIME looked at STRAIGH=
T SHOT, "actually there has been a call out
> since I arrived which is why =
ones like Polar Claw and his team
> arrived." He directed a hand at the him=
 standing to one side. "I hope
> that if there are any others they show up =
soon though."
> 
> BIG CONVOY, who quite possibly outrank everyone here nod=
ded
> thoughtfully, "It is a good plan, however I have soldiers to recover.=
"
> He was referring to LONGRACK and the others that were left behind
> ins=
ide MAGMATRON's base.
> 
> Grunting CONVOY continued, "I have been thinking=
, we passed through a
> transport doorway to get off of it, so it is possib=
le that they may
> still be alive."
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> - Preston
>
